title.rendered: The BODHI Father’s Day Gift Guide

content.rendered:
Treat Dad this Father’s Day to some BODHI man maintenance. Here’s our TOP 6 suggestions to have Dad looking and feeling his best naturally.

  1. BODHI HEAD MASSAGE | 60 MIN

Melts away stress and tension. This brilliant head massage will revitalise Dad and alleviate any fatigue. Using ancient healing techniques and pressure points it promotes deep relaxation and balances the upper chakras to bring about a profound sense of wellbeing. A luxurious Sodashi scalp mud then deeply nourishes and conditions hair and scalp.

  1. WARM BAMBOO MASSAGE | 60 or 90 MIN

This unique massage uses warm bamboo rods to knead out knots, soothe aching muscles and melt away all tension. It alleviates fatigue, soothes the senses and stimulates circulation to aid detoxification, leaving Dad deeply calm yet energised.

  1. TENSION RELEASE MASSAGE | 60 or 90 MIN

For the sporty Dad. An intense and invigorating massage, this therapeutic treatment melts away deep-seated tension and fatigue. In combination with strengthening essential oils, it traces discomfort back to original cause, to address and alleviate symptoms.

  1. BODHI MAN FACIAL | 60 MIN

Firm, thorough and results driven, this multi-tasking no-nonsense facial is crafted specifically to treat male skin concerns, whilst it melts away stress and tension. Customised to your skin’s needs to deliver optimal results, this facial includes a double cleanse, exfoliation and extended facial massage with bioactive oils, leaving skin brighter, hydrated, firmed and revitalised. For Dads with a beards, a botanical mask treatment is applied to condition and nourish.

  1. BODHI MAN ESCAPE: FACE + BODY | 2 HOURS

A complete ritual for face and body is especially designed for men. A Bodhi Tension Release Massage melts away deep-seated tension, followed by a vitamin-rich facial PLUS back scrub to deeply hydrate and nourish the skin for a visibly brighter, smoother complexion. Will leave Dad revitalised from top to toe.

  1. BODHI MAN RENEW: BODY | 2 HOURS 15 MIN

Deeply relaxing, energising and revitalising, this wellbeing journey starts with a detoxifying steam or infra-red sauna. A Salt Scrub follows to exfoliate and invigorate, followed by a Tension Release Massage with warm nourishing botanical oils to melt away stress, fatigue and deep-seated tension – for the most relaxed Dad in town!

Nurture Dad & WIN! Treat Dad to a BODHI Spa Gift Voucher and go into the draw to WIN a $1,000 BODHI Spa and Lamont’s wine/dine package! As our team for details.
